title: Analysis from sign chart part - b

content.description: Let f be a function that is continuous on the interval [0, 4). The function f is twice differentiable except at x = 2. The function f and its derivatives have the properties indicated in the table above, where DNE indicates that the derivatives of f do not exist at x = 2.
content.question: On the axes provided, sketch the graph of a function that has all the characteristics of f.

frqParts.text: On the axes provided, sketch the graph of a function that has all the characteristics of f.

topic.text: 5.8: Sketching Graphs of Functions and Their Derivatives

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
